'''ZoneAlarm''' is a [[Firewall (networking)|software firewall]] originally developed by [[Zone Labs]], which was acquired in March 2004 by [[Check Point]]. It includes an inbound intrusion detection system, as well as the ability to control which programs can create outbound connections — the latter not available in the [[Windows XP]] Service Pack 2 firewall. [[As of 2008|As of early 2008]], the newest release is ZoneAlarm 7.1, the first to be compatible with [[Windows Vista]] (32 bit). It is not compatible with 64 bit Windows Vista, and may not be available in the near future.<ref>{{citeweb|title=ZoneAlarm products currently available for Vista(32 bit only) users|url=http://www.zonealarm.com/store/content/catalog/products/vista.jsp|publisher=zonealarm.com|accessdate=2008-02-06}}</ref>
+
'''ZoneAlarm''' is a [[Firewall (networking)|software firewall]] originally developed by [[Zone Labs]], which was acquired in March 2004 by [[Check Point]]{{fact}}. It includes an inbound intrusion detection system, as well as the ability to control which programs can create outbound connections — the latter not available in the [[Windows XP]] Service Pack 2 firewall. [[As of 2008|As of early 2008]], the newest release is ZoneAlarm 7.1, the first to be compatible with [[Windows Vista]] (32 bit). It is not compatible with 64 bit Windows Vista, and may not be available in the near future.<ref>{{citeweb|title=ZoneAlarm products currently available for Vista(32 bit only) users|url=http://www.zonealarm.com/store/content/catalog/products/vista.jsp|publisher=zonealarm.com|accessdate=2008-02-06}}</ref>
